name: CVE-2020-12762
description: json-c through 0.14 has an integer overflow and out-of-bounds write via a large JSON file, as demonstrated by printbuf_memappend.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:json-c_project:json-c:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:30:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:31:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:32:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:18.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:14.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:20.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:12.04:*:*:*:-:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_ins:1.0:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_ins:1.0:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_ins:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
